body_html:
i've edited the fb-internal link out, it's not useful for github consumption. Maybe paste it into a gist.github.com file or even just inline into the issue.

From the discussion last time (since a few months ago), it was seen as pretty drastic to not have 14.04 and CentOS7 customers have an out-of-the-box experience. We didn't discuss the topic since. What changed?
